channel.title: Less is better: Another stop on the RubyCLR World Tour

item.title: Another stop on the RubyCLR World Tour
item.description: I’ll be giving a keynote on the Future of Programming Languages at VS Live! in Toronto on April 26. I’ve been spending a lot of time thinking about why dynamic languages are important, so this is a story that I can’t not tell. While this keynote isn’t just about RubyCLR, you can bet that it will play a major role in the story :)
item.author: jlam@iunknown.com (John Lam)
